text: Mary Lee Woods (12 March 1924 â€“ 29 November 2017) was an English mathematician and computer programmer. She worked in a team that developed programs in the School of Computer Science, University of Manchester Mark 1, Ferranti Mark 1 and Mark 1 Star computers. She met and married Conway Berners-Lee while working at Ferranti. Sir Tim Berners-Lee is one of their children. She died on 29 November 2017 at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:English mathematicians Category:English computer scientists Category:People from Birmingham Category:Alumni of the University of Birmingham Category:Academics of the University of Manchester
title: Mary Lee Woods
